Obsessive-Compulsive and
Related Disorders (129)
The following specifier applies to Obsessive-Compulsive and Related
Disorders where indicated:
aSpecify if: With good or fair insight, With poor insight, With absent in-
sight/delusional beliefs

Specify if: Tic-related

Specify if: With muscle dysmorphia

Specify if: With excessive acquisition

Compulsive and Related Disorder (134)
Note: See the criteria set and corresponding record-
ing procedures for substance-specific codes and
ICD-9-CM and ICD-10-CM coding.

set during withdrawal, With onset after medica-
tion use

symptoms, With appearance preoccupations,
